description: This file defines the main React component for the calendar scheduler app, handling state management, UI rendering, and interactions such as navigating months, selecting dates, and managing events.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Reloads the list of calendar events from the data source.

methods.name: goToday
methods.description: Resets the calendar view to the current month and day.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Prepares the UI for creating a new event, optionally setting the default date.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Saves or updates an event, then refreshes the event list.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes an event by its ID and refreshes the event list.
